description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to: (i) improve teaching practices and implement curricular reform at the primary level at selected schools; and (ii) strengthen the teaching capacity and improve the learning environment of the University of Guyana Faculty of Health Science.

condition.narrative: Schedule 2, Section 1, A.2 (Project Staff)The Government shall maintain at all times during Project implementation, professionalstaff in adequate numbers and with terms of reference, qualifications and functions acceptable to the Association and set forth inthe Operational Manual, to perform all functions related to the Project, including a Project coordinator, a procurement officer, afinancial management officer, a part-time engineer when needed, a monitoring and evaluation officer, a part-time environmentalsafeguards officer, and a part-time social development officer.

Schedule 2, Section 1, A.3 (Steering Committee)The Government shall establish within thirty (30) days of the date of signature ofthe Financing Agreement and thereafter operate, and maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a committee (theSteering Committee) to be chaired by the MOE to provide policy guidance and coordination of Project activities, with functions,responsibilities and composition, including representatives of MOF, NCERD, UG and CPCE, all acceptable to the Association.

Schedule 2, Section 1, B (Subsidiary Agreement)To facilitate the carrying out of Component 2 of the Project, and prior to carryingout of any activity under said part of the Project, the Government shall enter into an agreement (the Subsidiary Agreement) withthe UG, under terms and conditions acceptable to the Association.

Schedule 2, Section 1, C (Operational Manual)The Government shall adopt, and thereafter carry out the Project in accordance withthe provisions of, a manual (the Operational Manual) acceptable to the Association.
